# VespeR

> Control plane for Claude Code workflows.

VespeR provides:
- Interactive coding session management
- Reusable agents and patterns (solo, loop, panel, debate)
- Execution observability (DAG, timeline, activity)
- Smart resume snapshots for ended sessions

## Canonical
- https://vesper.run/

## Project Links
- Repository: https://github.com/ranausmanai/VespeR
- README: https://github.com/ranausmanai/VespeR#readme
- Issues: https://github.com/ranausmanai/VespeR/issues

## Quickstart
```bash
pip install -e .
npm -C frontend install
npm -C frontend run build
vesper ui --port 8420 --no-browser
```
